column4: anyone know if it's possable to mount an audio cd ?
fearful doesn't answer my Q for one, and for another thing that requires a gui
fearful do you know a way to mount them ?
does anyone know a way to mount an audio cd ?
hal should take care of it for you and mount it automagically
if not, try mounting /dev/scd0 or whichever device it is on /media/disk
is it possable to mount them ?
right. so pop open a terminal and type "man mount"
yep, though normally I don't need to go to cmdline for it
this i have to learn, ....  or you do one,
